title: 820-4924 Keyboard and trackpad disappeared after boot
message:
Hi, i have a problem with a Macbook Pro 13" 820-4924. Keyboard and trackpad work perfect if i push option button at start : can select drives, enter wifi key and move the trackpad. After boot OS they both disappeared and appear the windows where i have to connect a bluetooth keyboard or mouse. 
Things done :
- changed U4820
- changed U4830
- changed U4850
- changed Q7979
- changed U8000
All resistor and capacitors around these chips have correct values.
Thanks

title: 820-4924 Keyboard and trackpad disappeared after boot
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum.

Check R4902-04.
Post U4910 voltages, when macOS booted.

title: 820-4924 Keyboard and trackpad disappeared after boot
message: You are the number one ! It had a fall after boot on the PP3V3_S3 due to a corrosion quite invisible. Thank you very much !
